\begin{titlepage}
%
% NOMENCLATURE PAGE
%
% DO NOT EDIT THIS PAGE.  NOMENCLATURE IS HANDLED USING THE IN-TEXT DECLARATIONS
% (SEE main.tex FOR SYNTAX/USE) AND THE REQUIRED BACKGROUND FILES ARE
% GENERATED BY RUNNING THE SHELL SCRIPT DISTRIBUTED WITH THIS TEMPLATE PACKAGE.
% INSTRUCTIONS FOR USING THIS SCRIPT ARE FOUND AT THE BOTTOM OF main.tex.
%
% IF YOU DID NOT RECEIVE A COPY OF THE SHELL SCRIPT, USE THE FOLLOWING COMMANDS
% TO GENERATE THE NOMENCLATURE:
%		1.) COMPILE THE LATEX DOCUMENT AS NORMAL
%		2.) RUN THE FOLLOWING IN THE TERMINAL:
%			'makeindex <filename>.glo -s nomencl.ist -o <filename>.gls' (OLD VER.)
%			'makeindex <filename>.nlo -s nomencl.ist -o <filename>.nlS' (NEW VER.)
%		3.) COMPILE THE LATEX DOCUMENT ONCE MORE
%
% NOTE THAT 'OLD VERSION' AND 'NEW VERSION' REFER TO THE VERSION OF YOUR
% INSTALLATION OF THE nomencl PACKAGE.

\begin{center}
  %\printglossary 	% OLD VERSION
  \printnomenclature % NEW VERSION
\end{center}

\end{titlepage}
